table.title: Clustered Real-time Search Activity
table.searchString: | tstats `SearchActivitySummaries` max(_time) as _time max(Search_History.total_run_time) as trt max(Search_History.scan_count) as scan_count values(Search_History.actualsearch) as actualsearch values(Search_History.savedsearch_name) as savedsearch_name values(Search_History.user) as user values(Search_History.result_count) from `SA_SearchHistory` where Search_History.searchtype=realtime by Search_History.searchid | `SARename` | eval search = if(isnull(savedsearch_name) OR savedsearch_name="", actualsearch, "(" . savedsearch_name . ") --- " . actualsearch) | cluster labelonly=t field=search | stats values(user) as "User(s)" count as "# of Runs" avg(trt) as "Avg Runtime" sum(trt) as "Total Runtime" avg(scan_count) as "Avg Scan Count" first(search) as "Representative Search String" by cluster_label | fields - cluster_label | sort - "Total Runtime" | foreach *Runtime Avg* [fieldformat <<FIELD>>=round(<<FIELD>>,2)]
